title: Static Freight Management Website (Home, About, Services, Contact)

requirements.text: Create a static marketing website for a freight management company with four pages: Home, About Us, Services, and Contact Us.

quotes: create a freight management website static. with lot of freight related services offering. with for pages home about us services and contact us

acceptanceCriteria: The site has 4 distinct routes/pages: Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us.
All pages render without backend dependencies and work as a static brochure site.
Navigation between pages works via a consistent header navigation on desktop and mobile.

requirements.text: Implement a consistent site layout (header with navigation, main content area, footer) shared across all pages.

quotes: with for pages home about us services and contact us

acceptanceCriteria: Header includes the company name/logo area and links to Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us.
Footer appears on every page and includes at minimum: company name, a short tagline, and basic contact placeholders (phone/email/location).
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop widths.

requirements.text: Home page: include a hero section, trust/credibility highlights, and call-to-action sections that direct users to Services and Contact Us.

quotes: create a freight management website static

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a hero with a headline, subheadline, and primary CTA button linking to Contact Us.
Home page includes 3–6 credibility highlight items (e.g., on-time delivery, global coverage, tracking, customs expertise) presented as cards or a grid.
Home page includes a brief services preview section linking to the Services page.

requirements.text: About Us page: provide company overview content sections (mission, values, what makes the company different) and a simple timeline or stats strip.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page includes at least: Company Overview, Mission & Values, and Why Choose Us sections.
About Us page includes either a timeline component (3–5 milestones) or a stats strip (e.g., years in business, shipments handled, countries served).

requirements.text: Services page: showcase many freight-related services as clearly structured categories with service cards and brief descriptions.

quotes: with lot of freight related services offering.

acceptanceCriteria: Services page includes multiple categories (e.g., Air Freight, Ocean Freight, Road/Trucking, Rail, Customs Brokerage, Warehousing, Last-mile, Project Cargo, Freight Insurance, Supply Chain Consulting).
Each service is displayed as a card/list item with a title and 1–3 sentence description.
Services page provides a CTA area linking to Contact Us for quotes/consultations.

requirements.text: Contact Us page: include a static contact form with client-side validation and a non-sending submission experience (e.g., success message) plus visible company contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes: Name, Email, Phone (optional), Service Interested In (select), Message.
Client-side validation: required fields and valid email format; show inline error messages.
On submit, the app shows a success state (no external email/service integration).
Page includes visible contact details (email, phone, office address placeholders) and business hours placeholders.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme across the site (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a freight/logistics brand; avoid a blue/purple default look.

quotes: create a freight management website static

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across pages (same button styles, card styles, headings, spacing scale).
Color palette is not the default blue/purple; use a distinct logistics-appropriate theme (e.g., charcoal + safety orange accents or deep green + sand accents).
All pages look visually consistent and polished with Tailwind styling.

requirements.text: Add static image assets (generated) for branding and page visuals, and render them from the frontend public assets folder.

quotes: create a freight management website static

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero image and logo appear on the site without being served through the backend.
Images are optimized for web display (appropriate dimensions and file types).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add third-party authentication or external email/messaging integrations; Contact form must remain static (client-side only).
Do not introduce additional backend services; keep the site static without requiring Motoko canister logic.
nonGoals: User accounts, login, or Internet Identity integration.
Quote pricing calculators or shipment tracking with real data.
Form submissions sending emails or storing messages in a database/canister.

required: Freight logistics hero banner with cargo ship, airplane, and trucks in a modern flat/photoreal blended style (freight-hero.dim_1920x800.png)
Minimal logistics company logo mark with abstract container/truck motif, dark-on-light version (freight-logo-light.dim_512x512.png)
Minimal logistics company logo mark with abstract container/truck motif, light-on-dark version (freight-logo-dark.dim_512x512.png)
Set of 10 simple line/duotone service icons (air, ocean, trucking, rail, customs, warehousing, last-mile, project cargo, insurance, consulting) (freight-service-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for all user-facing website copy.
